ExternalRuleID.description: Unique identifier to an external data rule, e.g. PPDM rule ID number.

DataRuleStatus.description: status of the business rule such as Published

DataRuleCreatedOn.description: Date of creation of data rule independent of OSDU

DataRuleCreatedBy.description: User that created the rule independent of OSDU

DataRuleUpdatedOn.description: Timestamp of the time when the data rule was updated independent of OSDU.
